name: Générer automatiquement des articles SEO dans WordPress avec Gemini AI et OpenAI Images
description:
### Ce modèle n8n vous aide à automatiser le processus de génération, de téléchargement et d'enregistrement d'articles optimisés pour le SEO en tant que brouillons sur votre site Wordpress en utilisant des agents IA pour le contenu et les visuels.

Les cas d'utilisation sont nombreux : 
- **Propriétaires de blogs** : Gardez facilement votre blog Wordpress à jour avec des articles automatisés et optimisés pour le SEO et des images mises en avant.
- **Marketeurs affiliés** : Publiez rapidement des articles Wordpress riches en mots-clés pour augmenter le trafic et les revenus d'affiliation sans écriture manuelle.
- **Rédactions et équipes de contenu** : Rédigez et téléchargez instantanément des articles Wordpress opportunes pour rester en avance sur les sujets tendance avec un minimum d'effort.
- **Agences** : Automatisez la création et la publication de contenu sur plusieurs sites Wordpress de clients, augmentant ainsi la production de votre agence.

## Comment ça fonctionne
- Le flux de travail commence par un déclencheur manuel dans n8n.
- Le domaine du site Wordpress cible - où l'article sera publié - est spécifié à l'aide du nœud **Champs – Définir le site Web**.
- L'**Agent – Choix de sujet et générateur de titre** utilise Google Gemini pour sélectionner aléatoirement l'un de vos sujets liés au site Web pré-définis et demande au modèle de générer des éléments d'article dans le format que vous avez spécifié. Les résultats sont ensuite analysés et acheminés vers le prochain agent IA.
- L'**Agent – Générateur d'articles** (alimenté par Google Gemini) crée un article complet, optimisé pour le SEO, adapté à vos paramètres et au sujet sélectionné.
- Le flux de travail télécharge ensuite l'article généré par l'IA en tant que brouillon sur votre site Wordpress.
- Ensuite, le contenu de l'article est envoyé à **OpenAI** pour générer une image mise en avant unique et pertinente.
- L'image générée est téléchargée et définie comme l'image mise en avant dans le brouillon de l'article.
- (Optionnel) Enfin, le flux de travail peut vous notifier via **Telegram** (ou toute application de messagerie connectée) que le post est prêt en tant que brouillon sur votre compte Wordpress pour un examen ultérieur.


⚠️ **Remarque importante** : 

Dans la configuration de l'invite par défaut du premier **Agent – Choix de sujet et générateur de titre**, le domaine du site Web est défini sur **Agent Circle**, l'industrie est **Technologie et Intelligence Artificielle**, et les **5 sujets disponibles** pour la génération d'articles sont : Intelligence Artificielle (IA) ; Agents IA ; Automatisation ; Flux de travail ; Invites). 

Pour obtenir les meilleurs résultats pour votre site, veuillez vous assurer d'ajuster cette partie de l'invite pour correspondre à votre propre domaine de site Web, votre industrie et les sujets les plus pertinents pour votre public. 

## Comment configurer
- Téléchargez et importez le flux de travail dans votre espace de travail n8n.
- Configurez les identifiants nécessaires pour chaque outil :
     - **API Google Gemini** (pour la génération d'éléments d'article) → connecté aux nœuds **Modèle de chat Google Gemini 1** et **Modèle de chat Google Gemini 2**.
     - **API OpenAI** (pour créer des images mises en avant uniques) → connecté au nœud **OpenAI - Générer une image**.
     - **Accès API Wordpress** (pour publier, télécharger et définir des images mises en avant) → connecté au nœud **Wordpress - Publier un brouillon**.
     - (Optionnel) **Telegram** ou votre application de chat préférée (pour les notifications de complétion).
- Ajustez le nœud **Champs – Définir le site Web** pour correspondre à votre domaine de site Web Wordpress cible.
- Déclenchez manuellement le flux de travail en cliquant sur **Tester le flux de travail** ou **Exécuter le flux de travail**.
- Attendez que le processus se termine.
- Recevez une notification de chat ou vérifiez le brouillon directement dans votre tableau de bord Wordpress.

## Exigences
- Une instance **n8n** (auto-hébergée ou cloud).
- Accès à l'API **OpenAI** (pour la génération d'images).
- Accès à l'API **Wordpress** avec des permissions administratives.
- Accès à **Google Gemini** (pour la sélection avancée de sujets et la génération d'articles).
- (Optionnel) Identifiants API pour **Telegram** ou une autre application de messagerie si vous souhaitez recevoir des notifications lorsque le processus est terminé.

## Comment personnaliser
- **Modifier les sujets, les éléments d'article et les directives** : Vous pouvez facilement personnaliser les sujets pré-définis dans l'invite d'instruction au sein du nœud **Agent – Choix de sujet et générateur de titre**, ainsi qu'ajuster les descriptions ou la structure de chaque élément d'article pour répondre à vos besoins et à votre style.
- **Intégrer d'autres déclencheurs de chat** : Connectez-vous à Slack, Discord ou tout outil de messagerie pour mettre à jour les progrès.
- **Choisissez votre modèle IA** : Alternez entre Google Gemini et OpenAI pour la génération de contenu, ou ajoutez votre LLM préféré.

## Besoin d'aide ?
Si vous souhaitez que ce flux de travail soit personnalisé, ou si vous cherchez à créer un agent IA sur mesure pour votre propre entreprise - n'hésitez pas à contacter [**Agent Circle**](https://www.agentcircle.ai/). Nous sommes toujours là pour vous soutenir et vous aider à concrétiser vos idées d'automatisation.

Rejoignez notre communauté sur différentes plateformes pour obtenir de l'aide, de l'inspiration et des conseils d'autres.

Site Web : https://www.agentcircle.ai/
Etsy : https://www.etsy.com/shop/AgentCircle
Gumroad : http://agentcircle.gumroad.com/
Discord Global : https://discord.gg/d8SkCzKwnP
Page FB Global : https://www.facebook.com/agentcircle/
Groupe FB Global : https://www.facebook.com/groups/aiagentcircle/
X : https://x.com/agent_circle
YouTube : https://www.youtube.com/@agentcircle
LinkedIn : https://www.linkedin.com/company/agentcircle

workflow.name: Wordpress - Auto Generate and Post SEO Article

parameters.prompt:
=Create a highly realistic, natural-looking image that visually represents the blog article titled "{{ $json.title.raw }}". The image should be grounded in reality with believable lighting, textures, and composition—avoid fantasy or surreal elements. Focus on lifelike details that a real camera could capture. Do not include any text in the image.

Guidelines:

1. Subject Matter:
- Ensure the image directly relates to the central theme of the blog article.
- Depict real-world scenarios or objects that embody the article's core message.

2. Realism and Detail:
- Use natural lighting and authentic textures to enhance realism.
- Incorporate subtle details such as shadows, reflections, and depth of field to mimic real photography.

3. Composition:
- Employ a composition that aligns with professional photography standards, considering elements like framing, perspective, and balance.
- Avoid any fantastical or surreal components that could detract from the image's authenticity.

4. Technical Specifications:
- Aim for high-resolution output suitable for web publication.
- Ensure the image is free of any textual elements or overlays.

messageValues.message:
=You are an expert SEO blog writer for “Agent Circle” specializing in Technology and Artificial Intelligence content. For each request, you must:

1. Randomly select one category (exactly as shown):
– Artificial Intelligence (AI)
– AI Agents
– Automation
– Workflow
- Prompts

2. Create the following elements:

- Article Title: Unique, non-robotic, and engaging. Avoid using colons “:”. Clickbait is acceptable if not exaggerated.

- Slug: URL-friendly, lowercase, hyphen-separated.

- Focus Keyphrase: Maximum of 2 words, capturing the main idea.

- Meta Description: Up to 160 characters, summarizing the article compellingly.

3. Use the current year placeholder: If needed, incorporate {{ $now.year }} in the title to ensure content remains up-to-date.

Output exactly in this format:
Category: <chosen category>
Title: <your title>
Slug: <your-slug>
Focus Keyphrase: <max 2 words>
Meta Description: <≤160 characters>

parameters.text:
=Write a SEO Blog Article with 1,500–2,500-word.

Use the following inputs:
- Title: {{ $json.output.title }}
- Category: {{ $json.output.category }}
- Focus Phrase: {{ $json.output.focus_phrase }}

Instructions:

Title Handling
- Use the given title as-is.
- Do not repeat the title within the article body.

Opening Section (100–150 words)
- Start with an engaging hook to captivate readers.
- Seamlessly include the focus phrase within the first 2–3 sentences.
- Do not label this section as "Introduction".

Article Body Structure
- Use 4 to 6 H2 headings, each with optional 1–2 H3s underneath as needed.
- Include the focus phrase in at least one H2 or H3.
- Naturally use the focus phrase throughout the article (between 4 to 16 times total).
- Add bullet points, examples, data, or expert quotes to enrich the content.
- Include at least one outbound link to a relevant high-authority source (if available).
- Avoid inserting the article title again anywhere in the content.

Writing Style
- Friendly yet authoritative tone.
- Clear, digestible paragraphs (2–4 sentences each).
- Maintain logical flow with smooth transitions and varied sentence structure.
- Write for a general audience—avoid jargon or overly technical explanations.

Final Section (Conclusion & CTA)
- Do not label this section as “Conclusion”.
- Summarize the article’s key takeaways.
- End with a compelling call to action, encouraging readers to learn more or take the next step.
- Add a contact call-to-action like:
“For more insights or collaboration opportunities, visit www.agentcircle.ai.”

SEO & Readability
- Ensure excellent grammar and sentence flow.
- Optimize for keyword density and natural placement.
- Prioritize readability for desktop and mobile audiences.

Ensure flawless grammar, optimal keyword density, and readability for a general audience.

messageValues.message:
=Role: You are an elite blog writer for Dax AI, specializing in crafting highly valuable, SEO-optimized, audience-focused long-form articles ready for direct publication in WordPress. When provided with a topic or title, adhere strictly to the following guidelines: 1. Content Focus - Deliver practical tips, clear strategies, in-depth insights, or step-by-step guides directly related to the topic. - Prioritize original, actionable advice that readers can implement immediately. 2. Article Length & Structure - Minimum Word Count: 1,500 words. - Headings: - Utilize clear hierarchical headings to organize content: -

for main sections. -

for subsections. -

for detailed points within subsections. - Flow: - Ensure each section flows logically, with appropriate introductions, transitions, and conclusions. 3. SEO Optimization - Scannability: - Use short paragraphs (2–4 sentences). - Incorporate subheadings and bulleted or numbered lists for easy reading. - Keyword Usage: - Naturally incorporate relevant keywords without keyword stuffing. - Meta Description: - Write an engaging, concise meta description (under 160 characters) at the top of the article. 4. WordPress-Compatible Formatting - Output Format: - Provide plain text only—no Markdown, code fences, or additional commentary. - Headings: - Format headings as recognized by WordPress: -

Section Title

-

Subsection Title

-

Detailed Point

- Lists: - For bullet points, use a dash followed by a space (e.g., – Example item). - For numbered lists, use numerals followed by a period and a space (e.g., 1. Step one). - Do not bold list items. 5. Final Output - Content Only: - Provide only the article body in ready-to-publish WordPress format. - Exclude the article title, author bylines, and any formatting instructions. - Commencement: - Begin immediately with the first

section heading.

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
	"category": "AI Agent",
	"title": "Article Title",
    "slug": "article-slug",
	"focus_phrase": "focus phrase for SEO",
	"meta_description": "meta description under 160 characters"
}

additionalFields.categories:
={{ $('Agent - Topic Chooser & Title Generator').item.json.output.category == "Technology" ? [3] :
    $('Agent - Topic Chooser & Title Generator').item.json.output.category == "Artificial Intelligence (AI)" ? [4] :
    $('Agent - Topic Chooser & Title Generator').item.json.output.category == "Tech Fact" ? [7] :
    $('Agent - Topic Chooser & Title Generator').item.json.output.category == "Tech History" ? [8] :
    $('Agent - Topic Chooser & Title Generator').item.json.output.category == "Tech Tips" ? [9] : [1] }}

parameters.content:
## [n8n Automation] Auto-Generate SEO Articles In Wordpress - Try It Out!
**This n8n template helps you automate the process of generating, uploading, and saving SEO-optimized articles as drafts in your Wordpress site using AI agents for both content and visuals.**

Use cases are many: 
- **Blog Owners**: Effortlessly keep your Wordpress blog updated with automated, SEO-optimized articles and featured images.
- **Affiliate Marketers**: Rapidly publish keyword-rich Wordpress posts to boost traffic and affiliate earnings without manual writing.
- **Newsrooms & Content Teams**: Instantly draft and upload timely Wordpress articles to stay ahead on trending topics with minimal effort.
- **Agencies**: Automate content creation and publishing across multiple client Wordpress sites, scaling your agency’s output.

## How It Works
- The workflow begins with a manual trigger in n8n.
- The target Wordpress website domain - where the article will be published - is specified using the **Fields – Set Website** node.
- The **Agent – Topic Chooser & Title Generator** uses Google Gemini to randomly select one of your pre-defined website-related topics and requests the model to generate article elements in your specified format. The results are then parsed and routed to the next AI agent.
- The **Agent – Article Generator** (powered by Google Gemini) creates a complete, SEO-optimized article tailored to your settings and the selected topic.
- The workflow then uploads the AI-generated article as a draft post to your Wordpress site.
- Next, the article content is sent to the **OpenAI** to generate a unique, relevant featured image.
- The generated image is uploaded and set as the featured image in the draft post.
- (Optional) Finally, the workflow can notify you via **Telegram** (or any connected messaging app) that the post is ready as a draft on your Wordpress account for further review.


⚠️ **Important Note**: 

In the default prompt setup of the first **Agent – Topic Chooser & Title Generator**, the website domain is set to **Agent Circle**, the industry is **Technology and Artificial Intelligence**, and the **5 available topics** for article generation are: Artificial Intelligence (AI); AI Agents; Automation; Workflow; Prompts). 

To get the best results for your site, please make sure to adjust this part of the prompt to match your own website domain, your industry, and the topics most relevant to your audience. 

## How To Set Up
- Download and import the workflow into your n8n workspace.
- Set up the necessary credentials for each tool:
     - **Google Gemini API** (for article elements generation) → connected to nodes **Google Gemini Chat Model 1** and **Google Gemini Chat Model 2**.
     - **OpenAI API** (for creating unique featured images) → connected to the node **OpenAI - Generate Image**.
     - **Wordpress API access** (for posting, uploading, and setting featured images) → connected to the node **Wordpress - Post Draft**.
     - (Optional) **Telegram** or your preferred chat app (for completion notifications).
- Adjust the **Fields – Set Website** node to match your target Wordpress website domain.
- Manually trigger the workflow by clicking **Test Workflow** or **Execute Workflow**.
- Wait for the process to complete.
- Receive a chat notification or check the draft post directly in your Wordpress dashboard.

## Requirements
- An **n8n** instance (self-hosted or cloud).
- **OpenAI** API access (for image generation).
- **Wordpress** API access with admin permissions.
- Access to **Google Gemini** (for advanced topic selection and article generation).
- (Optional) API credentials for **Telegram** or another messaging app if you want to receive notifications when the process is complete.

## How To Customize
- **Modify topics, article elements and guildelines**: You can easily customize the pre-defined topics in the instruction prompt within Node **Agent – Topic Chooser & Title Generator**, as well as adjust the descriptions or structure of each article element to fit your needs and style.
- **Integrate other chat triggers**: Link up with Slack, Discord, or any messaging tool to update progress.
- **Choose your AI model**: Swap between Google Gemini and OpenAI for content generation, or add your preferred LLM.

## Need Help?
If you’d like this workflow customized, or if you’re looking to build a tailored AI Agent for your own business - please feel free to reach out to [**Agent Circle**](https://www.agentcircle.ai/). We’re always here to support and help you to bring automation ideas to life.

Join our community on different platforms for assistance, inspiration and tips from others.

Website: https://www.agentcircle.ai/
Etsy: https://www.etsy.com/shop/AgentCircle
Gumroad: http://agentcircle.gumroad.com/
Discord Global: https://discord.gg/d8SkCzKwnP
FB Page Global: https://www.facebook.com/agentcircle/
FB Group Global: https://www.facebook.com/groups/aiagentcircle/
X: https://x.com/agent_circle
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@agentcircle
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/agentcircle

## 1. Initiate And Set Up
- Specify the target Wordpress website domain using the **Fields – Set Website** node.
- Manually trigger the workflow.

## 2. Generate Topic, Title And Content With AI Agents
- The first **Agent – Topic Chooser & Title Generator** (using Google Gemini) randomly selects one of your pre-defined website-related topics (in the prompt) and requests the chat model to generate article elements in your specified format. The results are then parsed and routed to the next AI agent.
- The second **Agent – Article Generator** (powered by Google Gemini) creates a complete, SEO-optimized article based on your chosen topic and settings.


⚠️ **Important Note**: 

In the default prompt setup of the first **Agent – Topic Chooser & Title Generator**, the website domain is set to **Agent Circle**, the industry is **Technology and Artificial Intelligence**, and the **5 available topics** for article generation are: Artificial Intelligence (AI); AI Agents; Automation; Workflow; Prompts). 

To get the best results for your site, please make sure to adjust this part of the prompt to match your own website domain, your industry, and the topics most relevant to your audience.

## 3. Upload To Wordpress
- The workflow automatically uploads the generated article as a draft post to your Wordpress site.

## 5. Get Notified
- Receive a notification via Telegram or another connected chat app once the post is ready as a draft in Wordpress.

## 4. Create The Draft Post & Set Featured Image
- The article is sent to the OpenAI to create a unique, relevant visual.
- The generated image is uploaded and set as the featured image for the draft article. 
- The draft post is ready in the Wordpress dashboard for further review before manually publishing.
